YeuCau:
- tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên chuyên ngành cntt hoặc các ngành liên quan
- tối thiểu 10 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực sản xuất phần mềm, quản trị dự án trong công ty công nghệ. trong đó có tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc với khách hàng khối chính phủ.
- có năng lực điều hành, quản lý đơn vị có quy mô từ 50 nhân sự trở lên
- ưu tiên ứng viên có chứng chỉ pmp
- am hiểu về kỹ thuật, công nghệ các sản phẩm, dịch vụ của công ty và khối cơ quan nhà nước
- hiểu biết về thị trường/ đối thủ và các ứng dụng kỹ thuật công nghệ mới
- có tầm nhìn và tư duy chiến lược kinh doanh
-  có kỹ năng lập kế hoạch và tổ chức công việc, kỹ năng điều hành và quản lý nhân viên, kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề
- khả năng giao tiếp, đàm phán tốt

thời gian làm việc: thứ 2 - thứ 6 (nghỉ thứ 7 & cn)
MoTa:
1. phát triển sản phẩm, giải pháp phục vụ khách hàng khối chính phủ:
- xây dựng sản phẩm/dịch vụ phục vụ khách hàng khối chính phủ theo định hướng chiến lược kinh doanh của công ty, tập đoàn.
- đóng gói và đào tạo sản phẩm, dịch vụ theo hướng domain thuộc nhóm khách hàng khối chính phủ.
- tư vấn, hỗ trợ khách hàng trong quá trình khảo sát, đánh giá hiện trạng và nhu cầu ứng dụng cntt, thuê dịch vụ cntt.
- hoạch định năng lực công nghệ, kỹ thuật của khối phục vụ chiến lược phát triển sản phẩm/dịch vụ và triển khai các dự án ký kết với khách hàng.

2. tổ chức quản trị sản xuất, quản trị dự án trong khối chính phủ:
- tổ chức việc thẩm định phương án kỹ thuật trước khi đề xuất với khách hàng, khi dự thầu, khi đàm phán hợp đồng, khi triển khai.
- tổ chức triển khai dự án, quản trị dự án đảm bảo đúng phạm vi, tiến độ công việc đã ký kết/cam kết với khách hàng.
- tổ chức dịch vụ bảo hành, bảo trì sau bán theo ký kết với khách hàng.

3. hoạt động quản trị trong khối:
- xây dựng, đề xuất các quy chế, quy định, quy trình, tài liệu liên quan đến quản trị sản xuất/dự án của khối. tổ chức việc đào tạo, hỗ trợ vận hành quy trình, quy định và các hệ thống cho các bên liên quan.
- thực hiện báo cáo theo quy định và báo cáo đột xuất theo yêu cầu của ban lãnh đạo công ty
- quản lý các đơn vị trong trung tâm triển khai giải pháp của khối, bao gồm:
- quản lý nhân sự, tổ chức công việc của trung tâm phụ trách nhằm đảm bảo hoàn thành mục tiêu, chức năng, nhiệm vụ.
- xây dựng kế hoạch mục tiêu, ngân sách hoạt động của đơn vị. thực hiện theo dõi, đánh giá mục tiêu, ngân sách và trình điều chỉnh phù hợp theo định kỳ và phát sinh.
- xây dựng, đào tạo đội ngũ nhân sự đảm bảo mục tiêu từng thời kỳ.

4. thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác theo yêu cầu của ban lãnh đạo.

job description:

you will be responsible for configurations of microsoft dynamics modules, assisting clients throughout the implementation project, providing guidance and support for customized solutions. this position requires knowledge of finance or software functions of microsoft dynamics and will be involved in full cycle of project implementation.

which of these core values connects with you the most?our missionto make shopping rewarding, delightful, and accessible.our #shopback values
our values are not “sound/feel good” values that are for show. we understand how our values build our culture and believe these aligned values will help us work better together to achieve our mission. we will hire, part ways, recognize or reward shopbackers based on our values. 
upholding these values is as important as our performance at work.
here are our 8 values #shopback:
succeed as one we are one team. we win or lose as one shopback. we debate passionately with data and insight. we may disagree, but we always commit. 
honour our customers our customers’ happiness starts and ends with us. we obsess over earning their trust and never take it for granted.
own the problem our solutions are actionable, constructive, and solve for teams beyond our own. quick iteration beats slow perfection. think for the long-term and build for scale.
pave new roads we proactively improve current practices and do not tolerate mediocrity. the products of our innovation must be useful. our solutions simplify.
be better every day we have humility and self-awareness. we seek feedback proactively because it helps us grow. we own up to our mistakes.
always be curious we learn and improve faster than others. we understand deeply to seek the truth and are willing to be proven wrong.
can’t is not an optionwe possess grit and remain calm under pressure. we go all out to build a better shopback.
keep it real we are authentic and keep our word. we give feedback with good intentions. we treat everyone with respect.

excellent engagement skills, managing and coordinating between partners, acknowledging security, network, architecture and service management requirements.

we're seeking cloud engineers who approach cloud technologies through a devsecops lens and work comfortably with agile scrum methodologies. this is an exciting opportunity for you to become part of a team responsible for ensuring our cloud services are managed to the needs of our rapidly changing business. the work will be fast-paced, challenging, and often across new or emerging cloud technologies. we are looking for people who are technically forward-thinking and excited about the business value the cloud provides.our job responsibilites
your're responsible for onboarding asset teams into a managed cloud environment.
you develop and manage automation frameworks to provide monitoring, patch management, release management, security, and data retention.
in addition to the above, you will support and develop dr strategies, provide guidance and consulting around devops best practices and collaborate with other cloud teams to support delivery.
some key challenges that you will face are around scaling support and onboarding of assets through automation. with these challenges come opportunities to develop automated processes, working towards self-service capability for the managed services function.  working within nab regulatory and security guardrails can also prove challenging in such a large-scale environment.
you will be expected to provide out of hours support (rotated through a team roster) for cloud services as part of our 24x7 coverage agreement.

very competitive remuneration package
generous private family healthcare for yourself and your family members

TenCV: Salesforce Technical Consultant/ Business Analyst (Up to 1 Billion VND/ Year)
YeuCau:
*** must have requirements:  
- bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, business or a related field. 
- minimum 3 years of working experience at a similar position (technical consultant), with a strong understanding of salesforce architecture, data model, and security model. 
- salesforce certifications, such as salesforce certified administrator (adm-201) and salesforce certified platform app builder, are required. 
- proficiency in salesforce configuration, including custom objects, fields, workflows, validation rules, and other declarative features. 
- hands-on experience with salesforce lightning, visualforce, and apex development. 
- knowledge of salesforce integration methods, including rest and soap apis, data loaders, and middleware tools. 
- familiarity with data migration strategies and tools for salesforce. 
- strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions. 
- excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with clients and internal teams. 
- ability to manage multiple projects and priorities in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. 

*** preferred qualifications: 
- salesforce certified sales cloud consultant or service cloud consultant certification. 
- experience with salesforce cpq, marketing cloud, or other salesforce clouds and products. 
- knowledge of web technologies such as html, css, javascript, and web services. 
- familiarity with agile methodologies and project management tools. 

you’re not expected to have 100% of these skills. for this project, a smart mindset and good english skill are the key points. so, if this role interests you and you feel you have most of these things in your toolbox, we’d love to hear from you.
MoTa:
job description: 
- collaborate with clients to gather business requirements and translate them into salesforce solutions. 
- design and configure salesforce to meet client needs, including custom objects, fields, workflows, validation rules, and other customization. 
- develop and implement salesforce lightning components, visualforce pages, and apex classes to extend the functionality of salesforce. 
- perform data migration and integration tasks to import/export data between salesforce and other systems. 
- provide guidance and best practices to clients on salesforce configuration and customization. 
- conduct system testing and user acceptance testing to ensure the quality of implemented solutions. 
- create and deliver training sessions and documentation to enable clients to effectively use salesforce. 
- stay up-to-date with salesforce releases, features, and industry trends to provide innovative solutions to clients. 
- collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, administrators, and project managers, to deliver successful projects on time and within budget. 
- assist in pre-sales activities, including solution demonstrations and proposal development. 

benefits: 
- attractive package including base salary + 13th month salary + performance bonus.  
- package is up to 1 billion vnd annually, detail for each level will be discussed case by case 
- insurance based on full base salary and medical benefit (bao viet insurance package) for employee and family 
- 100% of full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working 
- 100% salary during probation time 
- working in a fast paced, flexible, and multinational working environment with opportunity to travel onsite (in 49 countries) 
- internal training (technical & functional & english) 
- working with outstanding colleagues coming from top universities and top companies in vietnam and foreign countries 
- career development opportunities in a giant tech group just entering a new market
- flexible working time, hybrid mode

communicate and work with other teams to develop bms and embedded device.

develop components of bsw (com, can,lin, mem, diag, os…) for embedded device.

trung tâm không gian mạng viettel (viettel cyberspace center - vtcc) là đơn vị công nghệ trẻ trực thuộc tập đoàn công nghiệp - viễn thông quân đội (viettel), với mục tiêu trở thành công ty công nghệ hàng đầu khu vực. hiện tại chúng tôi đang phát triển các sản phẩm công nghệ dựa trên các nền tảng về dpi (deep packet inspection), bigdata, machine learning, ai (artificial intelligence), data mining, speech recognition, chatbot, cdn cloud.
lập kế hoạch thực thi dự án, quản trị rủi ro, chịu trách nhiệm về dự án trước các stakeholder và các hoạt động của dự án.
tiếp nhận yêu cầu từ bộ phận kinh doanh/các phòng ban khác, tổ chức khảo sát, thống nhất yêu cầu với các bên liên quan.
phòng ngừa/nhận diện/giải quyết vấn đề của dự án.
lên kế hoạch đảm bảo giảm thiểu/ngăn ngừa rủi ro dự án.
phối hợp với các stakeholder, báo cáo về tình hình dự án, đề xuất các phương án để dự án chạy thông suốt, đảm bảo chất lượng dự án.
thực hiện các công việc khác theo phân công của lãnh đạo."

đãi ngộ# dẫn đầu thị trường

cơ hội được thử sức trong những lĩnh vực công nghệ tiên tiến, hiện đại nhất.
# môi trường năng động sáng tạo
môi trường làm việc cởi mở và năng động, khuyến khích trao đổi ý tưởng ở mọi cấp, cho phép bạn làm việc, sáng tạo theo cách riêng.
được khơi gợi cảm hứng làm việc với văn phòng xanh, không gian mở, hiện đại tiêu chuẩn quốc tế.
# cơ hội thử thách và phát triển
áp dụng kiến thức, kĩ năng, kinh nghiệm chuyên môn giải quyết các bài toán hấp dẫn, thử thách tại viettel.
cơ hội thử sức ở nhiều lĩnh vực, sản phẩm và quốc gia khác nhau góp phần thay đổi xã hội .
viettel cam kết cho bạn nền tảng vững chắc để học hỏi và phát triển.
sẵn sàng trao quyền, cơ hội đột phá cho những người trẻ tuổi.
cơ hội học hỏi từ các chuyên gia hàng đầu, lãnh đạo và đồng nghiệp ưu tú.
cơ hội được đào tạo, trao dồi kĩ năng định kì và nhu cầu thực tế.
# chế ngộ đãi ngộ hấp dẫn, cạnh tranh
lương thưởng cạnh tranh trên thị trường, phản ánh đúng năng lực thực tế.
được thư giãn, khơi nguồn sáng tạo với happy time mỗi ngày .
thưởng thức bữa trưa thơm ngon tại tập đoàn, được chọn lọc bởi các chuyên gia dinh dưỡng.
cơ hội tham gia gắn kết với tập thể, tổ chức với các hoạt động team building thú vị
chế độ chăm sóc y tế đặc biệt cho cbnv và người thân với trang thiết bị hiện đại.
khácviettel tuyệt đối không thu bất cứ khoản tiền nào của ứng viên khi nộp hồ sơ tham gia dự tuyển và khi vào làm việc tại viettel nếu trúng tuyển

MoTa:
the role:

our world class information technology team is seeking an it help desk coordinator to provide technical assistance and end-user support related to computer systems and hardware/software. you will support end users, write technical documents and manage asset inventory. you will respond to tickets/queries, run diagnostic programs, isolates problem, and determine and implement solutions.

what the team wants you to know:

being an it help desk coordinator at ampere® is interesting, challenging, and will expand your professional breadth. you will have the opportunity to work in cloud environments and global infrastructure systems and you will learn how to configure and administer highly complex saas environments to allow for infinite growth. the experience at ampere® that you will possess will be valuable for your career path.


what you'll do:

- be part of an empowered culture where you are a key contributor to the success of the company.
- provide day-to-day technical support to employees via helpdesk ticketing system.
- troubleshoot and resolve basic client hardware, operating system, and software related problems.
- maintain inventory of all it equipment (laptops, servers, network equipment, etc.).
- assist with new-hire orientation and manager on/off-boarding tasks.
- actively work in the helpdesk ticketing system to respond, resolve, and/or escalate tickets to the appropriate teams in a timely manner to maintain slas (service level agreements).
- create solutions/documentation as needed.
- create/remove user accounts in various systems as needed.
- assist with managing various tools such as microsoft (office 365, azure, intune, windows 10, office), apple (mac os), antivirus/malware, encryption.
- manage vendors to install and configure equipment.

play, grow and win

YeuCau:
minimum 3 years of working experience in the project manager or experience leading projects role with software development/ai background.
well-proven experience in managing multi-regional / distributed project teams.
proven experience in project plan, project estimation, quality management, resource management and risk management.
good communicator with effective stakeholder management & conflict resolution skills.
ability to clearly, concisely and accurately report on project progress and outcomes to management groups.
solid knowledge and practices with traditional sdlc and agile methodologies.
strong organizational, analytical and problem-solving skills.
attitude to do everything possible to over-achieve project goals.
passion to study more knowledge about technology, especially in ai.
strong business communication in english and vietnamese.
japanese speaking at n2 level is a big plus.
MoTa:
position descriptionas a project manager of cinnamon ai labs, you will handle multiple projects, not only ensure projects are delivered on time and within budget but must also engage and encourage your teams. project manager needs strong critical thinking capabilities to solve problems as they arise and finely-tuned communication skills to ensure everyone remains informed, motivated.project manager as the central role to facilitate the communication between various stakeholders and control project risks. pm will be expected to coordinate internal stakeholders, find out the needs and concerns of each cinnamon business functions, make proposals & reports of development progress for ai-features and manage project quality and delivery by cooperating with engineers, researchers and quality assurance within our group.this is an exciting opportunity for those who enjoy r&d and being challenged to grow in the field of ai-first software/product development. along the way this role will contribute to game-changing products for the multi-trillion-dollar industry. responsibilities and performance objectives:scope management: works with delivery manager to identify the scope of the project, and ensures that all of the approved scope is in fact being delivered. schedule management:  project manager is responsible for defining project schedule and resolving derailments and communicating effectively with team members and other stakeholders to ensure the project gets back on track. resource management: works with cross-functional departments (ai/se/qal…) to assign the resource to the projects, calculates the team capacity to align with project plan.risk management: expertized at risk management and contingency planning to continue moving forward even when roadblocks occur.budget management: project manager sticks to the budget for a project as closely as possible. if certain parts of the project end up costing more than anticipated, project managers moderate the spend and update the delivery manager.quality management: project manager involves identifying quality metrics and standard measures for project processes, regulatory compliance requirements, product functionality, documentation.stakeholder engagement: project manager monitors stakeholder engagement in the project and adjusts strategies as per requirements. it will increase the stakeholder engagement activities as the project evolves and progresses. project manager also ensures that the right information reaches the stakeholder.process management: project manager is responsible for defining, refining and managing project process, release/delivery process.   managing documentation and reports:
a project manager must develop effective ways to measure and analyze the project’s progress. 
project manager defines strategies for documenting a project include data collection and verbal and written status reports. 
project manager ensures that all relevant actions are approved and that these documents are archived for future reference.
leadership abilities:
project manager is responsible for excellent communication, as well as a keen eye for the team's strengths and weaknesses, then defining the plan for team members to improve their skills.
project manager trains and coaches the team about the working process to improve team performances. 

schedule and facilitate meetings related to projects to ensure the transparency of information between management and development.
PhucLoi:
the chance to work on cool world-class projects!we’re not an academic research institute. we’re a global ai product company. our focus is to create applicable ai products which can bring huge impact to users. in order to do so, our solutions is the combination of innovative ai core technology and solid business understanding. there are 3 main categories:image processingvoice recognitionnatural language processinghow is our working environment?we strongly believe that go-global ambition requires international-standard members. cinnamon will create the best environment for all members to grow toward that goal.#grit: ability to stay extremely persistent toward the goal. #stretchyouself: actively learn and take new opportunity in the area of knowledgeand experience that you don’t have before. #leadership-driventeamwork: proactively seek for mutual understanding in anycollaboration.what we will return
attractive compensation and benefits.
employee centric culture and a belief that we should hire those who are good at what they do and then give them the tools they need to achieve success, further their expertise and grow their career.
a commitment to learning and growth and easy ways to achieve both including a training budget, education assistance, mentorship programs and collaborative learning sessions.
a collaborative environment that fosters communication via slack and an open-door policy.

MoTa:
overview

this position is located within the ee division of vinfast engineering, located in hanoi.  the purpose of the role is to deliver esim and network strategies and solutions to vinfast vehicles, across a number of diverse global markets.
the manager will be require to capture and define requirements from across the business, identifying and select technical and commercial solutions that satisfy current strategic needs whilst also future-proofing for new features and go-to-market strategies.  these requirements will form the basis of a roadmap to be created and maintained, along with tactical delivery of the solutions to our vehicles.  this includes compliance to local telecom regulations and maintenance of a regulatory landscape roadmap.
finally a roadmap toward new technologies must be created and maintained, presented regularly to leadership for strategic approval.  

responsibilities
- ownership of cellular connectivity/esim roadmap and consolidated strategy
- capture of cross function requirements, gtm and operational service strategy
- mapping of requirements to technical solutions and product releases
- creation of rfq/rfp documentation, vendor technical and commercial analysis and selection
- delivery to vehicle launch of technical solutions, including validation
- network certification delivery, regulatory compliance of end-to-end solution
- maintain roadmap of regulation, new technologies and network sunsets

•	good interpersonal skills, team player, yet able to work independently in a fast-paced environment. 
•	good command of written and spoken english.
•	have a keen eye for details, highly organized with excellent follow-up skills.
•	flexible in working hours.
•	confident to speak to different groups and can make presentation independently with good presentation skills.

critical competencies for success
knowledge
•	generates ideas for improvement based on past experience
•	understands personal development areas and is driven to “bridge” gaps
•	will ask relevant questions to improve business awareness/knowledge
•	strives for high standards of delivery to clients
•	is aware of client contracts & what is w.i.p. / “out of scope”
•	able to work under direct supervision

commercial awareness / financial accountability
•	understands tmf group’s services, and how the organisation is structured
•	understands and applies control, risk and governance frameworks consistently
•	records time accurately and within deadlines
•	is involved in or responsible for debt collection in his/her area of responsibility
•	is mindful financially of personal impact on business

people management
•	may delegate to junior staff, with clear explanation
•	understands own motivation and impact of personal attitude on own performance

stakeholder engagement
•	builds and maintains relationships at all levels across the group
•	is mindful of culture differences across a diverse organization

corporate citizenship

•	acts with integrity
•	upholds the values of the organisation in all they do
•	trustworthy team member who considers those around them
MoTa:
job purpose

the senior executive will be required to analyse client requirement relate to payroll software and solution. to maintain excellent execution of day-to-day operations duties, contributing to and implementing changes to meet the needs of the business and clients. to provide service broader than data transactions – advice, knowledge of internal process impact, recognition of risks/mitigation.

key responsibilities
•	analyzing root causes and gap of the issues, and providing specific solutions to clients.
•	receiving requirements from clients and converting to technical models/terms.
•	analyzing, planning and preparing technical documents for client’s new request, assessing the feasibility and risk of request, estimating cost and timeline to accomplish the requests.
•	working with vendor’s development team to implement new requests on system/application.
•	preparing test cases, test scenarios and creating test environment to conduct the test before deploying in production.
•	technical support for daily and ad-hoc requests from clients.
•	managing, configuring and fixing core/system/application to follow client’s policies and labor law.
•	managing and configuring database, preparing scripts to support client’s daily and ad-hoc requests.
•	generating data and reports based on client’s requests.
•	presenting and training system/application to clients.
•	technical support payroll team regarding core/system/application.
•	generating data and reports based on payroll team’s requests.

this role focuses on key responsibilities and tasks performed when developing new product features or maintaining existing ones. it’s anticipated that product developers will develop the capability to work across diflerent parts of our technical “stack” as necessary, but this role proﬁle focuses mostly on integrations development.
what are the most important responsibilities and functions?
1.	software engineering (65% of the time) - write code, add new features, perform maintenance, ﬁx bugs, write tests, perform code reviews, produce technical documentation.
2.	team assistance (15% of the time) - pair with other developers, help others solve problems, teach others how the system works, discuss improvements in technology and processes, work with product owners and delivery managers to scope changes and ship projects.
3.	dev ops (10% of the time) - building and maintaining infrastructure as code, deploying code into production, monitoring the performance of the system, assisting upgrades.
4.	support (10% of the time) - quickly respond to bugs or issues, investigate data issues, clearly communicate with the support or solutions team, produce documentation for the solutions team to operate integrations, participate in the regular dev ﬁrst responder roster.

the definition of great workplacefor many of us, a great workplace could be beautiful offices, premium benefits, grand parties. of course, it should be included but not limited. at enlab, we strive to build a company where amazing people like you could do your best work, inspired by professional but warm colleagues. it's where you could foster your professional growth and build a healthy personal life. in the end, we create a life-long relationship.flexible timingsyour working hours work on your own schedule. in the end, the result only matters.green and bright officewe built an office building that is surrounded by trees, lights, and fantastic views. we’ve got a collaborative lounge and ample breakout spaces for an efficient workflow.healthy working lifestylewe prepare spacious cafeterias with healthy snacks and cooking machines for your happy belly. and yeah, some excellent coffees to make your day. and of course, some fitness tools to strengthen your muscles.door to peace and mindfulnesshow about your mind and soul? we reserve one space in our office for practicing meditation. we believe this practice could help you to release stress, find calm back to your soul, and enjoy the mindfulness status.“learn-it-all" culturewe find the niches between project deadlines for providing mentor guides and seminars to train you. take advantage to polish your skills and knowledge. we create an environment for a continuous-learning mindset. and we hope you share this mindset to grow better together.last but not least, merit moneypay rise, promotions, and top opportunities will come along with your professional development. periodically.

which of these core values connects with you the most?our missionto make shopping rewarding, delightful, and accessible.our #shopback values
our values are not “sound/feel good” values that are for show. we understand how our values build our culture and believe these aligned values will help us work better together to achieve our mission. we will hire, part ways, recognize or reward shopbackers based on our values. 
upholding these values is as important as our performance at work.
here are our 8 values #shopback:
succeed as one we are one team. we win or lose as one shopback. we debate passionately with data and insight. we may disagree, but we always commit. 
honour our customers our customers’ happiness starts and ends with us. we obsess over earning their trust and never take it for granted.
own the problem our solutions are actionable, constructive, and solve for teams beyond our own. quick iteration beats slow perfection. think for the long-term and build for scale.
pave new roads we proactively improve current practices and do not tolerate mediocrity. the products of our innovation must be useful. our solutions simplify.
be better every day we have humility and self-awareness. we seek feedback proactively because it helps us grow. we own up to our mistakes.
always be curious we learn and improve faster than others. we understand deeply to seek the truth and are willing to be proven wrong.
can’t is not an optionwe possess grit and remain calm under pressure. we go all out to build a better shopback.

keep it real we are authentic and keep our word. we give feedback with good intentions. we treat everyone with respect.

- khả năng làm việc độc lập, phối hợp làm việc và quản lý nhóm tốt;
- khả năng giao tiếp, đàm phán, thuyết phục tốt;
- kỹ năng tổng hợp, trình bày báo cáo tốt; phân tích, tư vấn tốt về cơ chế ghi nhận kết quả kinh doanh, các chiều phân tích dữ liệu;
- có khả năng hoạch định công việc, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao trong công việc.

** quyền lợi:
- thu nhập hấp dẫn, lương thưởng cạnh tranh theo năng lực
- thưởng các ngày lễ, tết (theo chính sách ngân hàng từng thời kỳ)
- được vay ưu đãi theo chính sách ngân hàng từng thời kỳ
- chế độ ngày phép hấp dẫn theo cấp bậc công việc
- bảo hiểm bắt buộc theo luật lao động + bảo hiểm vpbank care cho cbnv tùy theo cấp bậc và thời gian công tác
- được tham gia các khóa đào tạo tùy thuộc vào khung đào tạo cho từng vị trí
- thời gian làm việc: từ thứ 2 – thứ 6 & 02 sáng thứ 7/ tháng
- môi trường làm việc năng động, thân thiện, có nhiều cơ hội học đào tạo, học hỏi và phát triển; được tham gia nhiều hoạt động văn hóa thú vị (cuộc thi về thể thao, tài năng, hoạt động teambuiding...)
MoTa:
1. xây dựng khung văn bản:
xây dựng các quy định, quy trình, tiêu chuẩn, mẫu biểu cho công tác phát triển, vận hành hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu, báo cáo tài chính.

2. quản lý vận hành phát triển hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu:
- định hướng, tư vấn và kiểm soát việc phát triển các giải pháp, công cụ khai thác dữ liệu, và hệ thống dữ liệu và báo cáo;
- quản lý vận hành hệ thống server, database: tổ chức tối ưu lưu trữ lưu trữ vật lý các databases, datafiles; định kỳ bảo trì hệ thống, sắp xếp dữ liệu đảm bảo hiệu năng ổn định của hệ thống, đảm bảo tính bảo mật.
- xây dựng quy chuẩn lập trình, các công cụ, package tiện ích nhằm tối ưu hóa trong việc phát triển dữ liệu; kiểm soát chất lượng, quy trình, quy chuẩn lập trình và có các hỗ trợ/tư vấn kỹ thuật kịp thời cho các thành viên trong team đảm bảo chất lượng đầu ra của dữ liệu.

3. quản lý chất lượng dữ liệu:
- đánh giá hệ thống dữ liệu và các lỗi dữ liệu tiềm ẩn, đưa ra đề xuất chốt kiểm soát, xây dựng lộ trình phát triển các chốt kiểm soát nhằm tối ưu hóa chất lượng dữ liệu;
- thực hiện vai trò data steward; quản lý bộ quy tắc chấm điểm chất lượng dữ liệu các yếu tố dữ liệu trọng yếu và các quy tắc phát hiện lỗi dữ liệu;

4. lập kế hoạch năng lực:
-phân tích tình trạng hiện tại về tính sẵn có, khả năng đáp ứng của hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu tài chính, tốc độ tăng trưởng của hệ thống dữ liệu, số lượng nghiệp vụ phát sinh mới, số lượng user, số lượng yêu cầu xử lý đồng thời (concurrent request) để tiến hành lập kế hoạch năng lực và kế hoạch mua sắm, nâng cấp hệ thống.

5. quản lý dự án:
tham gia các dự án của ngân hàng có liên quan đến dữ liệu và báo cáo tài chính: kiểm soát tiến độ phần công việc quản trị dữ liệu; phối hợp với khối cntt/ nhà thầu đánh giá yêu cầu thực hiện cũng như các ảnh hưởng liên quan tới số liệu tài chính; rà soát và xác nhận trên tài liệu phân tích nghiệp vụ. tham gia quá trình uat theo kế hoạch;

6. quản lý con người:
tuyển dụng, đào tạo hướng dẫn các cbnv trong đơn vị để nâng cao kiến thức, kinh nghiệm chuyên môn, kĩ năng của các thành viên; tư vấn và hỗ trợ kịp thời cho các thành viên khi có vướng mắc hoặc phương án xử lý tối ưu trong nhóm;

7. khác:
đưa ra các đề xuất nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả công việc. thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của trưởng phòng.

YeuCau:
3+ year experience with launching and managing complex products.
strong technical background with experience in software development.
good project management skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple initiatives simultaneously.
good communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively work with cross-functional teams.
analytical mindset with strong problem-solving abilities.
understanding of telecommunications infrastructure is appreciated but not mandatory.
entrepreneurial spirit with a drive to innovate and push boundaries.
intense curiosity and willingness to learn
good conversational and written english
MoTa:
b3networks, a leading provider of digital telecommunication infrastructure, is seeking a talented technical product manager to join our newly established infrastructure business unit. the unit mission is to bridge the gap between telecommunications infrastructure and developers. this is a great opportunity to shape the future of cloud communication and lay the foundation for a new generation of communication applications to come. our partners include the top telcos in the southeast asia region. and you will be building solutions used by the top application developers in the world. if you are passionate about driving technical product strategy and delivering exceptional developer experiences at immense scale, we want to hear from you. apply now to join our dynamic team and make a significant impact in the world of digital telecommunications! responsibilities:
lead the end-to-end product lifecycle management, from concept to launch, ensuring successful delivery and adoption of our product.
collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, engineers, and designers, to define product requirements, prioritize features, and drive product development.
conduct market research, analyze industry trends, and identify customer needs to inform product strategy and roadmap.
work closely with partners and customers to understand their requirements, gather feedback, and provide technical guidance and support.
define clear product specifications and user stories, and effectively communicate them to the development team.
monitor product performance and user feedback, and iterate on features and functionalities to continuously improve the developer experience.
stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry developments, and incorporate them into product planning and strategy.
PhucLoi:
we only hire top talents from top universities, and we always create equal opportunities for everyone to shine.on hiring newcomers, we’d rather need a fast learner with little experience yet positive attitude than those who have a lot of experience but failed our attitude test.we also believe that a players can only work with a players, they can’t stand b players. and we commit ourselves to create an environment where everyone constantly competes for the best.
all the benefits of employee under vietnam labor law.
14 days annual leaves
private healthcare insurance from the company.

MoTa: - chịu trách nhiệm chuyên môn về thiết kế và lập trình giao diện của sản phẩm để đáp ứng mục tiêu kinh doanh của dự án.  - tiếp nhận yêu cầu từ po, phối hợp với ba để lập trình giao diện đem lại trải nghiệm tốt cho người dùng.  - phối hợp làm việc với các thành viên trong nhóm và công việc chuyên môn liên quan đến cntt (sa, front end dev, test…) trong quá trình hoàn thiện sản phẩm theo yêu cầu nghiệp vụ.
PhucLoi: 1. chế độ đãi ngộ hấp dẫn, xứng đáng với năng lực  - lương hàng tháng và các chế độ phụ cấp cạnh tranh trên thị trường  - thưởng cuối năm hấp dẫn theo đánh giá hiệu quả công việc  - thưởng sinh nhật, lễ/tết, thăm hỏi ốm đau…  - chăm sóc sức khoẻ toàn diện: khám sức khoẻ hàng năm, gói bảo hiểm shb care  - các hoạt động teambuilding, văn hoá - thể thao gắn kết nội bộ - du lịch 2 lần trong năm  2. môi trường làm việc hiện đại, tiên phong đổi mới  - không gian làm việc trẻ trung, hiện đại, đề cao sự sáng tạo  - làm việc với tinh thần tự chủ, linh hoạt và tiên phong  - các chương trình đào tạo, phát triển năng lực chuyên môn đa dạng

YeuCau:
từ 3 năm kinh nghiệm lập trình backend, ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc với nodejs

ưu tiên: có kinh nghiệm triển khai về các giải pháp liên quan tới thẻ-vé điện tử, thẻ cứng hoặc express, bike, car..

có tư duy tốt, tinh thần ham học hỏi, năng động

khả năng làm việc trong môi trường nhóm

sử dụng nodejs, javascript để phát triển backend server side

tham gia xây dựng và góp ý sản phẩm cùng đội ba và dev
phối hợp với các thành viên trong dự án, qa và qc để hoàn thiện sản phẩm
PhucLoi:

đam mê công nghệ

MoTa:
network technical support job descriptionas a network technical specialist for global services, your main responsibility is providing technical support to partners, strategic customers and service providers from all regions, around the clock. vacancies will form part of a team that provides 24/7 technical support services all year round including public holidays at the relevant time slots. the position goes with a hybrid working model. responsibilities: 
provide technical supports via support ticketing system
peplink products, technologies and solutions inquiry
share knowledge or technical details on forum and knowledge base
provide pre-sales technical supports, such as formulate a solution and product sizing to customers
simulate technical problems or scenario in lab as part of the troubleshooting
generate clear and concise technical tips, case notes and white paper
in a complicated situation, should make an appropriate escalation to the relevant teams and work together to solve the issue  
works on duty roster prepared to support for 24/7

-	thực hiện các báo cáo kỹ thuật và tài liệu liên quan đến dự án.

MoTa:
life‘s good with lg!lg electronics development vietnam (lgedv) produces high-quality in-car infotainment systems that deliver both information and entertainment on-the-go for many of the world‘s biggest automobile brands. lgedv conducts core r&d activities, and various product reliability tests in support of our vehicle component business.as an it communicator, your main responsibilities will be:
join, interpret the discussion content in regular meetings among customer, hq and lgedv.
interpret and coordinate (call pic or reschedule, etc.) meetings for remote test.
translate japanese specifications, test cases and other required japanese documents.
review test cases translated by the lge's tool.
manage issue with stakeholders and facilitate the meeting with varies parties to triage issue and dispatch to appropriate function team for their fixing.

CongTy: Công Ty Cổ Phần Thanh Toán Quốc Gia Việt Nam
YeuCau:
a)	trình độ học vấn: 
tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên, các chuyên ngành: công nghệ thông tin/ toán – tin ứng dụng/ khoa học dữ liệu/ toán tài chính/ toán kinh tế, thương mại điện tử, thanh toán điện tử, tài chính/ngân hàng tại các trường thuộc khối kinh tế, kỹ thuật như đh ngoại thương, đh kinh tế quốc dân, học viện ngân hàng, học viện tài chính, đh thương mại, đh bách khoa, đại học quốc gia …. hoặc các trường đh nước ngoài có uy tín tại các nước phát triển 
b)	kiến thức/kinh nghiệm:
-	có tối thiểu 02 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực liên quan.
c)	năng lực chuyên môn: 
-	có hiểu biết tổng thể về công ty napas và dịch vụ thẻ, lĩnh vực thanh toán.
-	nắm rõ các quy định, văn bản pháp luật và các kiến thức, kỹ năng chuyên môn nghiệp vụ thuộc lĩnh vực đảm nhiệm ở mức độ tốt.
-	có khả năng thực hiện các công việc chuyên môn có tính chất phức tạp, linh hoạt đảm bảo tuân thủ quy trình/quy định của công ty phù hợp với quy định của pháp luật.
-	có kiến thức và có kinh nghiệm liên quan đến lĩnh vực rủi ro trong hoạt động thanh toán. 
-	có kinh nghiệm triển khai hoặc kiến thức, hiểu biết về hệ thống và cơ sở dữ liệu, phân tích dữ liệu.
-	có khả năng tham gia ý kiến xây dựng quy chế, chính xác, quy trình, hướng dẫn nghiệp vụ.
-	có khả năng xử lý tốt các công việc theo quy trình và các công việc mới phát sinh khi có yêu cầu

which of these core values connects with you the most?our missionto make shopping rewarding, delightful, and accessible.our #shopback values
our values are not “sound/feel good” values that are for show. we understand how our values build our culture and believe these aligned values will help us work better together to achieve our mission. we will hire, part ways, recognize or reward shopbackers based on our values. 
upholding these values is as important as our performance at work.
here are our 8 values #shopback:
succeed as one we are one team. we win or lose as one shopback. we debate passionately with data and insight. we may disagree, but we always commit. 
honour our customers our customers’ happiness starts and ends with us. we obsess over earning their trust and never take it for granted.
own the problem our solutions are actionable, constructive, and solve for teams beyond our own. quick iteration beats slow perfection. think for the long-term and build for scale.
pave new roads we proactively improve current practices and do not tolerate mediocrity. the products of our innovation must be useful. our solutions simplify.
be better every day we have humility and self-awareness. we seek feedback proactively because it helps us grow. we own up to our mistakes.
always be curious we learn and improve faster than others. we understand deeply to seek the truth and are willing to be proven wrong.
can’t is not an optionwe possess grit and remain calm under pressure. we go all out to build a better shopback.
keep it real we are authentic and keep our word. we give feedback with good intentions. we treat everyone with respect.

proven experience coaching and mentoring a team, and holding regular sessions for training
background in supporting cloud services (aws or azure) with a healthy knowledge in windows and/or linux system administration
experience supporting either azure foundational services (virtual machines, sql managed instance, nsg’s, asg’s, lb etc.) or aws services (ec2, vpc, s3, ebs, dynamodb, rds, etc.)
experience using cloud-native tools (i.e. azure log analytics, azure update management, azure functions, redshift, emr, and glue, etc.) to review metrics, manage and monitor system/service health and utilization of our cloud services
a keen interest in automation and an ability to utilise tooling to improve efficiencies and repeatable tasks but also improve the day to day reliability and performance of our cloud managed services
working as infrastructure-as-code development and deployment

understanding of good cloud change management practices with an awareness of compliance and security standards.

experience in fine tuning virtualization, storage configuration, and replication for specific workloads
excellent engagement skills, managing and coordinating between partners, acknowledging security, network, architecture and service management requirements.
MoTa:
we're seeking cloud engineers who approach cloud technologies through a devsecops lens and work comfortably with agile scrum methodologies. this is an exciting opportunity for you to become part of a team responsible for ensuring our cloud services are managed to the needs of our rapidly changing business. the work will be fast-paced, challenging, and often across new or emerging cloud technologies. we are looking for people who are technically forward-thinking and excited about the business value the cloud provides.our job responsibilites
your're responsible for onboarding asset teams into a managed cloud environment.
you develop and manage automation frameworks to provide monitoring, patch management, release management, security, and data retention.
in addition to the above, you will support and develop dr strategies, provide guidance and consulting around devops best practices and collaborate with other cloud teams to support delivery.
some key challenges that you will face are around scaling support and onboarding of assets through automation. with these challenges come opportunities to develop automated processes, working towards self-service capability for the managed services function.  working within nab regulatory and security guardrails can also prove challenging in such a large-scale environment.
you will be expected to provide out of hours support (rotated through a team roster) for cloud services as part of our 24x7 coverage agreement.

TenCV: Salesforce Technical Consultant/ Business Analyst (Up to 1 Billion VND/ Year)
YeuCau:
*** must have requirements:  
- bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, business or a related field. 
- minimum 3 years of working experience at a similar position (technical consultant), with a strong understanding of salesforce architecture, data model, and security model. 
- salesforce certifications, such as salesforce certified administrator (adm-201) and salesforce certified platform app builder, are required. 
- proficiency in salesforce configuration, including custom objects, fields, workflows, validation rules, and other declarative features. 
- hands-on experience with salesforce lightning, visualforce, and apex development. 
- knowledge of salesforce integration methods, including rest and soap apis, data loaders, and middleware tools. 
- familiarity with data migration strategies and tools for salesforce. 
- strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions. 
- excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with clients and internal teams. 
- ability to manage multiple projects and priorities in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. 

*** preferred qualifications: 
- salesforce certified sales cloud consultant or service cloud consultant certification. 
- experience with salesforce cpq, marketing cloud, or other salesforce clouds and products. 
- knowledge of web technologies such as html, css, javascript, and web services. 
- familiarity with agile methodologies and project management tools. 

you’re not expected to have 100% of these skills. for this project, a smart mindset and good english skill are the key points. so, if this role interests you and you feel you have most of these things in your toolbox, we’d love to hear from you.
MoTa:
job description: 
- collaborate with clients to gather business requirements and translate them into salesforce solutions. 
- design and configure salesforce to meet client needs, including custom objects, fields, workflows, validation rules, and other customization. 
- develop and implement salesforce lightning components, visualforce pages, and apex classes to extend the functionality of salesforce. 
- perform data migration and integration tasks to import/export data between salesforce and other systems. 
- provide guidance and best practices to clients on salesforce configuration and customization. 
- conduct system testing and user acceptance testing to ensure the quality of implemented solutions. 
- create and deliver training sessions and documentation to enable clients to effectively use salesforce. 
- stay up-to-date with salesforce releases, features, and industry trends to provide innovative solutions to clients. 
- collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, administrators, and project managers, to deliver successful projects on time and within budget. 
- assist in pre-sales activities, including solution demonstrations and proposal development. 

benefits: 
- attractive package including base salary + 13th month salary + performance bonus.  
- package is up to 1 billion vnd annually, detail for each level will be discussed case by case 
- insurance based on full base salary and medical benefit (bao viet insurance package) for employee and family 
- 100% of full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working 
- 100% salary during probation time 
- working in a fast paced, flexible, and multinational working environment with opportunity to travel onsite (in 49 countries) 
- internal training (technical & functional & english) 
- working with outstanding colleagues coming from top universities and top companies in vietnam and foreign countries 
- career development opportunities in a giant tech group just entering a new market
- flexible working time, hybrid mode

overview

this position is located within the ee division of vinfast engineering, located in hanoi.  the purpose of the role is to deliver esim and network strategies and solutions to vinfast vehicles, across a number of diverse global markets.
the manager will be require to capture and define requirements from across the business, identifying and select technical and commercial solutions that satisfy current strategic needs whilst also future-proofing for new features and go-to-market strategies.  these requirements will form the basis of a roadmap to be created and maintained, along with tactical delivery of the solutions to our vehicles.  this includes compliance to local telecom regulations and maintenance of a regulatory landscape roadmap.
finally a roadmap toward new technologies must be created and maintained, presented regularly to leadership for strategic approval.  

responsibilities
- ownership of cellular connectivity/esim roadmap and consolidated strategy
- capture of cross function requirements, gtm and operational service strategy
- mapping of requirements to technical solutions and product releases
- creation of rfq/rfp documentation, vendor technical and commercial analysis and selection
- delivery to vehicle launch of technical solutions, including validation
- network certification delivery, regulatory compliance of end-to-end solution
- maintain roadmap of regulation, new technologies and network sunsets

có kiến thức vững về quy trình, các công cụ và kỹ thuật tự động hóa trong devops như ci/cd, hệ thống quản lý mã nguồn, công cụ triển khai tự động.
có kinh nghiệm triển khai các quy trình ci/cd bằng các công cụ như jenkins, gitlab-ci/cd hoặc circleci để tự động hóa quy trình xây dựng, thử nghiệm và triển khai
sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ giám sát và ghi nhật ký như elk stack (elasticsearch, logstash, kibana) prometheus, grafana để đảm bảo khả năng hiển thị, phát hiện sự cố và khắc phục sự cố hiệu suất hệ thống.
thành thạo các ngôn ngữ viết kịch bản và tương tác với hệ thống như python, bash hoặc powershell để tự động hóa các tác vụ lặp đi lặp lại, hợp lý hóa các quy trình và nâng cao hiệu quả.
có kiến thức về các nguyên tắc và tiêu chuẩn an ninh thông tin
nắm vững kiến thức về networking
có kinh nghiệm làm việc với hệ quản trị csdl: mssql, oracle, postgresql, mongo.

lợi thể: hiểu biết về cấu hình và quản lý hệ thống điện toán đám mây như aws, azure, hoặc google cloud.
yêu cầu kỹ năng mềm
có kỹ năng viết, giao tiếp và thuyết trình tốt.
có kỹ năng làm việc độc lập và đội nhóm tốt.
tinh thần hợp tác , phối hợp công việc tốt với nhóm dev, qc để đảm bảo tiến độ.
có tinh thần học hỏi và cầu tiến trong công việc.
MoTa:
thiết kế, xây dựng, duy trì và triển khai các ứng dụng phần mềm và hệ thống liên quan.
tự động hóa quy trình triển khai, bao gồm việc xây dựng, kiểm thử và triển khai phần mềm.
phối hợp với đối tác, các nhóm phát triển để đảm bảo phần mềm được xây dựng theo quy trình devsecops.
tích hợp các quy trình và công cụ devsecops để tạo ra một quy trình triển khai liên tục (ci/cd) tự động và hiệu quả.
theo dõi và giám sát hiệu năng, tình trạng, độ tin cậy và bảo mật của hệ thống, phát hiện và xử lý các vấn đề nhanh chóng.
phối hợp và giải quyết các vấn đề liên quan đến hạ tầng và triển khai phần mềm một cách nhanh chóng và hiệu quả.
hỗ trợ việc quản lý và giám sát hệ thống, bao gồm việc cấu hình và bảo trì các công cụ và dịch vụ.
nghiên cứu và áp dụng các công nghệ mới, công cụ mới và các tiêu chuẩn tốt nhất để nâng cao quy trình phát triển và triển khai trong lĩnh vực devsecops.

lương hấp dẫn + thưởng tháng lương 13 và các khoản thưởng lễ khác trong năm. (mức lương tùy thuộc vào năng lực và kinh nghiệm thể hiện khi phỏng vấn)
địa điểm làm việc: tổng công ty tân cảng sài gòn (saigon newport corporation), cảng cát lái, phường cát lái, tp.thủ đức, tp.hcm
ðược hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ phúc lợi xã hội như: bhxh, bhyt, bh thất nghiệp, lễ tết, team buiding, nghỉ mát hàng năm…
môi trường làm việc: chuyên nghiệp, trẻ trung, năng động, sáng tạo, có nhiều cơ hội khẳng định bản thân và thăng tiến trong nghề nghiệp
thời gian làm việc: 7h30 - 17h00 các ngày từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6 hàng tuần.
ngày nghỉ: thứ 7, chủ nhật và các ngày nghỉ lễ khác.
quyền lợi về đào tạo: được tham gia các chương trình đào tạo không giới hạn của snp;

PhucLoi: we hope vng is a place where you build your career. whether you want to pursue to be a manager or focus on professional development, we acknowledge and appreciate your talents. therefore, we open up to you more promotion opportunities in vng, and designed program to help you succeed in every single career path. no suit, no tie: at vng, we do not have many rules because we respect you and want to make comfortable atmosphere to help employees perform their jobs well.company “pay” for you: lunch, parking, swimming, learning english or gym for free and you know you are really in care.no barriers: office of vng is an open space because we always try to remove all barriers to help members easily shares with each other.being a big family: like a gift for family day. a party for the kids. we know how much your family matters.no rank at vng, members are encouraged to contribute ideas and debate with the others.be explored: ph.d., un-academic guy, bookish girl, fashion designers ... vngers are different and this diversity makes life more colorful.no "office": office is like your home. you can hang paintings, plant trees, even feed aquarium on the desk.be showed your best: vngers like to "mortification" with the group games such as: fansipan climbing, waterfall rafting, go over heat mats; there activities not only are tightening friendship, but also practice their bravery.gaming: even if you do not make the game, stealing beans in the boss’s garden or versusing with your colleagues in a sword competition play online is also an interesting way to relax.changing the world: creating an entertainment channel, building a social network and developing a game. on the internet world, every single thing you did can change the lives of many people.let’s join vng to share our mission: 'make the internet change vietnamese lives'

YeuCau:
minimum 3 years of working experience in the project manager or experience leading projects role with software development/ai background.
well-proven experience in managing multi-regional / distributed project teams.
proven experience in project plan, project estimation, quality management, resource management and risk management.
good communicator with effective stakeholder management & conflict resolution skills.
ability to clearly, concisely and accurately report on project progress and outcomes to management groups.
solid knowledge and practices with traditional sdlc and agile methodologies.
strong organizational, analytical and problem-solving skills.

MoTa:
position descriptionas a project manager of cinnamon ai labs, you will handle multiple projects, not only ensure projects are delivered on time and within budget but must also engage and encourage your teams. project manager needs strong critical thinking capabilities to solve problems as they arise and finely-tuned communication skills to ensure everyone remains informed, motivated.project manager as the central role to facilitate the communication between various stakeholders and control project risks. pm will be expected to coordinate internal stakeholders, find out the needs and concerns of each cinnamon business functions, make proposals & reports of development progress for ai-features and manage project quality and delivery by cooperating with engineers, researchers and quality assurance within our group.this is an exciting opportunity for those who enjoy r&d and being challenged to grow in the field of ai-first software/product development. along the way this role will contribute to game-changing products for the multi-trillion-dollar industry. responsibilities and performance objectives:scope management: works with delivery manager to identify the scope of the project, and ensures that all of the approved scope is in fact being delivered. schedule management:  project manager is responsible for defining project schedule and resolving derailments and communicating effectively with team members and other stakeholders to ensure the project gets back on track. resource management: works with cross-functional departments (ai/se/qal…) to assign the resource to the projects, calculates the team capacity to align with project plan.risk management: expertized at risk management and contingency planning to continue moving forward even when roadblocks occur.budget management: project manager sticks to the budget for a project as closely as possible. if certain parts of the project end up costing more than anticipated, project managers moderate the spend and update the delivery manager.quality management: project manager involves identifying quality metrics and standard measures for project processes, regulatory compliance requirements, product functionality, documentation.stakeholder engagement: project manager monitors stakeholder engagement in the project and adjusts strategies as per requirements. it will increase the stakeholder engagement activities as the project evolves and progresses. project manager also ensures that the right information reaches the stakeholder.process management: project manager is responsible for defining, refining and managing project process, release/delivery process.   managing documentation and reports:
a project manager must develop effective ways to measure and analyze the project’s progress. 
project manager defines strategies for documenting a project include data collection and verbal and written status reports. 
project manager ensures that all relevant actions are approved and that these documents are archived for future reference.
leadership abilities:
project manager is responsible for excellent communication, as well as a keen eye for the team's strengths and weaknesses, then defining the plan for team members to improve their skills.
project manager trains and coaches the team about the working process to improve team performances. 

schedule and facilitate meetings related to projects to ensure the transparency of information between management and development.
PhucLoi:
the chance to work on cool world-class projects!we’re not an academic research institute. we’re a global ai product company. our focus is to create applicable ai products which can bring huge impact to users. in order to do so, our solutions is the combination of innovative ai core technology and solid business understanding. there are 3 main categories:image processingvoice recognitionnatural language processinghow is our working environment?we strongly believe that go-global ambition requires international-standard members. cinnamon will create the best environment for all members to grow toward that goal.#grit: ability to stay extremely persistent toward the goal. #stretchyouself: actively learn and take new opportunity in the area of knowledgeand experience that you don’t have before. #leadership-driventeamwork: proactively seek for mutual understanding in anycollaboration.what we will return
attractive compensation and benefits.
employee centric culture and a belief that we should hire those who are good at what they do and then give them the tools they need to achieve success, further their expertise and grow their career.
a commitment to learning and growth and easy ways to achieve both including a training budget, education assistance, mentorship programs and collaborative learning sessions.
a collaborative environment that fosters communication via slack and an open-door policy.

TenCV: Business and Market Development Manager (Robotics / AI)
YeuCau:
· bachelor’s degree in engineering, it, business or related discipline 
· 5 years’ experience in sales and delivery operations, and strategic partnership management
· good knowledge and awareness of disruptive technologies like imaging ai, computer vision, robotics (amr/agv/cobot/etc), iot solutions, logistic automation solutions.
. experience and knowledge in manufacturing, logistics industry.
· strong business and financial acumen and judgement  
· strong analytical, planning, project management and execution skills 
· excellent interpersonal and communications skills communicating with internal and external stakeholders 
· proven ability to prepare and deliver presentations for customers, partners and senior management  

functional/ leadership competencies 
- taking risks and innovating
- setting vision and strategy
- managing yourself
- communicating effectively in both native language as well as english
- building and maintaining relationships

preferences/ desirables 
▪ open-minded and flexible in thought and tactics
▪ honesty and integrity
▪ able to deal with complexity

** benefits & compensations
- competitive salary
- commission/quarter
- meal allowance
- parking allowance
- petrol allowance
- full benefit as vietnam labor law: insurances, annual leave…
- private health insurance + 24 hour-accident insurance
- annual health check-up at international clinic
- company outing trip 1-2 time/year
- monthly company party
- team building activities
- young & friendly working environment
MoTa:
role overview/ job purpose 
overall responsible for business and market development of new products, solutions and businesses for the market. this involves understanding the industry and business of the customers to provide the right solution to meet customers’ needs. develop and grow customer base in the country to meet the revenue target. 

key responsibilities 
• drive business development activities for products such as imaging ai, computer vision, amr/agv, robotics, automation & iot solution, autonomous material handling (amh) and smart workflow optimization (swo) portfolios. 
• build relationships with stakeholders in the buying process including key decision makers 
• deep understanding of business requirements to ensure solution can meet customers’ needs
• prepare proposals for customers and tender submissions
• must have enough technical background to assess and articulate the customers’ needs to bic apac who will assist in the solution development
• know the market, competitors, industries for the new product  
• conduct demo of product and manage poc
• train km salesforce in the new products  
• meet revenue target
• manage customer throughout the sales, deployment and operation process

TenCV: Chuyên Gia Quản Trị Dữ Liệu (Phòng Quản Trị Dữ Liệu Tài Chính) – Hà Nội
YeuCau:
1.trình độ học vấn:
tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên chuyên ngành kinh tế, ngân hàng, kế toán, tin học…

2.các kinh nghiệm liên quan:
- kinh nghiệm: có ít nhất 8-10 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực quản trị dữ liệu đặc biệt là dữ liệu ngân hàng hoặc các vị trí liên quan tới hoạt động tổ chức, khai thác, thu thập dữ liệu;
- ưu tiên làm việc trong lĩnh vực ngân hàng về quản trị dữ liệu, quản lý dữ liệu, hệ thống thông tin báo cáo.

3.kiến thức/ chuyên môn có liên quan:
- am hiểu hoạt động kinh doanh và các sản phẩm dịch vụ của ngân hàng, hoạt động phân tích tài chính, kế toán quản trị, hệ thống thông tin và cơ sở dữ liệu của ngân hàng …
- có kiến thức chuyên môn sâu rộng về các hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu csdl (ms sql, oracle, db2…).
- có kinh nghiệm xử lý dữ liệu lớn, kỹ thuật lập trình tốt, nhạy bén số liệu.
- có kiến thức tốt về kiến trúc phần mềm, thiết kế phần mềm, triển khai phần mềm.
- am hiểu core banking t24 là một lợi thế.
- có kiến thức về ngôn ngữ lập trình r, sas, python, phân tích big data, xây dựng mô hình thống kê, v.v. là một lợi thế
- có kiến thức về các mô hình phân tích kinh doanh: mô hình dự báo - hàm hồi quy, cây quyết định, mạng nơ-ron nhân tạo, phân tích phân khúc, dự báo, tối ưu hóa, thống kê, v.v. là một lợi thế

4.các kỹ năng:
- trình độ tin học: thành thạo tin văn phòng, các công cụ lập trình
- trình độ ngoại ngữ (tiếng anh): giao tiếp thành thạo

5. các năng lực khác:
- khả năng nắm bắt công việc nhanh, quản lý, sắp xếp, xử lý công việc khoa học;
- thành thạo các phần mềm tính toán, phân tích số liệu và có khả năng làm việc tốt với số liệu;
- khả năng làm việc độc lập, phối hợp làm việc và quản lý nhóm tốt;
- khả năng giao tiếp, đàm phán, thuyết phục tốt;
- kỹ năng tổng hợp, trình bày báo cáo tốt; phân tích, tư vấn tốt về cơ chế ghi nhận kết quả kinh doanh, các chiều phân tích dữ liệu;
- có khả năng hoạch định công việc, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao trong công việc.

** quyền lợi:
- thu nhập hấp dẫn, lương thưởng cạnh tranh theo năng lực
- thưởng các ngày lễ, tết (theo chính sách ngân hàng từng thời kỳ)
- được vay ưu đãi theo chính sách ngân hàng từng thời kỳ
- chế độ ngày phép hấp dẫn theo cấp bậc công việc
- bảo hiểm bắt buộc theo luật lao động + bảo hiểm vpbank care cho cbnv tùy theo cấp bậc và thời gian công tác
- được tham gia các khóa đào tạo tùy thuộc vào khung đào tạo cho từng vị trí
- thời gian làm việc: từ thứ 2 – thứ 6 & 02 sáng thứ 7/ tháng
- môi trường làm việc năng động, thân thiện, có nhiều cơ hội học đào tạo, học hỏi và phát triển; được tham gia nhiều hoạt động văn hóa thú vị (cuộc thi về thể thao, tài năng, hoạt động teambuiding...)
MoTa:
1. xây dựng khung văn bản:
xây dựng các quy định, quy trình, tiêu chuẩn, mẫu biểu cho công tác phát triển, vận hành hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu, báo cáo tài chính.

2. quản lý vận hành phát triển hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu:
- định hướng, tư vấn và kiểm soát việc phát triển các giải pháp, công cụ khai thác dữ liệu, và hệ thống dữ liệu và báo cáo;
- quản lý vận hành hệ thống server, database: tổ chức tối ưu lưu trữ lưu trữ vật lý các databases, datafiles; định kỳ bảo trì hệ thống, sắp xếp dữ liệu đảm bảo hiệu năng ổn định của hệ thống, đảm bảo tính bảo mật.
- xây dựng quy chuẩn lập trình, các công cụ, package tiện ích nhằm tối ưu hóa trong việc phát triển dữ liệu; kiểm soát chất lượng, quy trình, quy chuẩn lập trình và có các hỗ trợ/tư vấn kỹ thuật kịp thời cho các thành viên trong team đảm bảo chất lượng đầu ra của dữ liệu.

3. quản lý chất lượng dữ liệu:
- đánh giá hệ thống dữ liệu và các lỗi dữ liệu tiềm ẩn, đưa ra đề xuất chốt kiểm soát, xây dựng lộ trình phát triển các chốt kiểm soát nhằm tối ưu hóa chất lượng dữ liệu;
- thực hiện vai trò data steward; quản lý bộ quy tắc chấm điểm chất lượng dữ liệu các yếu tố dữ liệu trọng yếu và các quy tắc phát hiện lỗi dữ liệu;

4. lập kế hoạch năng lực:

MoTa:
global fashion group is the leading fashion and lifestyle destination in growth markets across latam, sea and anz. our three e-commerce platforms: the iconic, zalora and dafiti connect an assortment of international, local and own brands to millions of consumers from diverse cultures and lifestyles. powered by our best-in-class operational infrastructure, which is fashion-specific and tailored to local market needs, our platforms provide an inspiring and seamless end-to-end customer experience. we stand for benchmark-setting customer service, delivery options, returns policies, and curation of brands.the data squadour data team knows our customers and their shopping habits better than they do. have you ever noticed suggested items when shopping online? or maybe a matching item for something you have just added to your bag? that’s our team! we use data analytics, data modelling and data forecasting to create a seamless customer experience, from suggesting sizes based on other brands you wear, to offering personalised product recommendations.we are a driving force behind our business strategies and decisions. we are integrated into all departments to ensure all employees at gfg have access to good quality and timely data. from insights to extracts, we can assist.our bi & analytics team works on some pretty cool stuff such as semantic layer development, data mesh modelling, real-time reporting capabilities and big behavioural data!a bit about the roleour systems handle a massive amount of traffic, and with more than 5 million customers visiting our site each month, the volume of data is large. our bi specialists work with data at scale and get hands-on experience in all facets of the data that we collect.you will work alongside skilled and collaborative team members as we transform our data infrastructure and will ensure that datasets for self-service and reporting are available of high quality.what you’ll do
deliver data capability through advanced bi methodologies to enable the business with data driven decision making.
design and develop the iconics data mesh. 
develop the semantic layer to enable self-service processes for other business areas including marketing, operations, trade etc.
building real-time enterprise reports/dashboards for the business.
support developing a data driven culture: driving data driven decision making (dddm) and analyzing patterns and facts from these insights to influence measurable goals, strategies and activities that benefit the business in a number of areas.

which of these core values connects with you the most?our missionto make shopping rewarding, delightful, and accessible.our #shopback values
our values are not “sound/feel good” values that are for show. we understand how our values build our culture and believe these aligned values will help us work better together to achieve our mission. we will hire, part ways, recognize or reward shopbackers based on our values. 
upholding these values is as important as our performance at work.
here are our 8 values #shopback:
succeed as one we are one team. we win or lose as one shopback. we debate passionately with data and insight. we may disagree, but we always commit. 
honour our customers our customers’ happiness starts and ends with us. we obsess over earning their trust and never take it for granted.
own the problem our solutions are actionable, constructive, and solve for teams beyond our own. quick iteration beats slow perfection. think for the long-term and build for scale.
pave new roads we proactively improve current practices and do not tolerate mediocrity. the products of our innovation must be useful. our solutions simplify.
be better every day we have humility and self-awareness. we seek feedback proactively because it helps us grow. we own up to our mistakes.
always be curious we learn and improve faster than others. we understand deeply to seek the truth and are willing to be proven wrong.
can’t is not an optionwe possess grit and remain calm under pressure. we go all out to build a better shopback.

keep it real we are authentic and keep our word. we give feedback with good intentions. we treat everyone with respect.

MoTa:
job summary:
in this impactful position with hoan my medical corporation (hmc), you will work closely with fellow members of hoan my it and ensure the success of our smart hospital journey through resilient it infrastructure capabilities.

you will be hands-on and expected to get into the details for managing or performing work associated with developing, implementing, remediating, monitoring and continuously it infrastructure services. 

as it infrastructure manager, you will:
•	manage a dedicated team of professionals to provide outstanding desktop and infrastructure support services for hoan my and our network of hospitals
•	ensure hoan my runs on resilient it infrastructure designed and supported to industry best practice for os, network, firewalls, systems, on prem and cloud services.
•	lead projects and implement to a high quality in a fast-paced environment
•	design, test, implement and remediate secure infrastructure in close collaboration with hmc cybersecurity.
•	conduct audits, evaluations and assessments, providing recommendations for the entire hoan my network.

bau operations
	manage day to day bau activities related to infrastructure and desktop services
	ensure high quality network, infrastructure operations, system incident troubleshooting and remediation for all hospital and clinics 
	ensure that tickets are processed within strict time frames and escalate incidents within defined timeframes
	lead infrastructure and desktop projects as well as act as sme for other projects as required
	identify and develop mitigation for issues or risks associated with assigned projects
	manage and optimize infrastructure and project budgets and forecasting
	design, implement and support lan / wan networks, wireless networks, infrastructure solutions to meet hospital requirements
	provide server, network switch, firewall and routers operational support and management
	assist in planning, design, hardware implementation, software, network and telephony capabilities
	develop operating, installation, and upgrade procedures for systems, hardware, network, security, storage and software
	management of backup and restore process for all servers and application in hoan my hospitals and clinics
	perform periodic network assessments and network/systems security audits
	plan and deploy patches update/upgrades for network devices and servers as per security recommendations
	ensure uptime and operational sla targets are met for servers and network systems
	provide security remediation for all vulnerabilities as identified by cybersecurity through pentest, va scan, news, microsoft patch tuesday, etc.
	test all changes to networks, hardware, software, and hosted applications
	maintain the necessary project plans and documentation of all system builds and modifications
	security policy implementation and monitoring for threats 
	site reliability testing 
	storage management, including both local storage hardware and cloud storage systems 
	ensure quality management of vmware virtualization environment
	support hospitals / clinics to rollout and adopt new applications and services
	support hmc it application team and ensure data load (etl/elt) completes successfully for hospital applications to udb on azure
	be responsible for training, technical guidance and support for it infrastructure teams at hospitals / clinics

infrastructure documentation, governance and best practices
	manage, develop, implement, and review industry-standard it infrastructure frameworks, policies, sop, standards and best practices
	document current hardware and network environments, including servers, pcs, it security and network systems, videoconferencing and telephony
	ensure that all it services are compliant with agreed quality, performance and customer experience standards; or have realistic plans in place to address areas requiring remediation
	documenting and disseminating security guidelines for common security issues, remediation mentorship, and security technology baselines
	ensure that all it services are compliant with hmc cybersecurity standards; or have realistic plans in place to address areas requiring remediation
	provides advice, counsel and support on infrastructure matters and recommended solutions for applications.
	work with relevant teams to establish drp (disaster recovery planning) and bcp (business continuity planning) and align with business need
	maintain subject matter knowledge, identify and monitor environmental and industry trends; current and emerging technologies and issues; and related legislative, legal and statutory changes

it vendor and partnerships
	maintain relational vendor and supplier partnerships
	manage outsourced vendors that provide infrastructure functions for compliance with hoan my security policies / processes / standards
	oversee and contribute to product evaluations, service selections and tender assessment in accordance with procurement office procedures
